column4: He nods.
She nods.
SOMEONE shifts his gaze then nods understandingly.
He nods and wipes wine off his face.
SOMEONE faces him distractedly, then nods.
He nods vigorously.
He nods. Back at the office, Samantha chases him.
SOMEONE nods once, then nods again.
He nods more vigorously, then stares into his mother's eyes.
She nods. SOMEONE takes her cup and sets it down then takes her hands in his.
The other teachers nod.
Avoiding SOMEONE's gaze, SOMEONE stares downward with a wistful smirk. He nods. With a glance at his friend, SOMEONE reaches for his file and eyes it, his chest heaves.
She nods appreciatively. SOMEONE gingerly touches a cut above his eye.
SOMEONE softly nods. He helps with the bandage.
SOMEONE meets her gaze and she nods.
SOMEONE<Larry> tensely nods and shrugs.
SOMEONE<Danny> calmly nods.
The dancers tap their heels, then nod to a neighboring stage where musicians play. One-by-one the dancers face the audience.
He nods.

Elsewhere, SOMEONE carries a crossbow to a tree trunk stump with two arrows. Plopping the weapon on the ground, he quizzically eyes SOMEONE a short distance away. The caretaker stands alone among the headstones, gesturing conversationally and nodding as if talking to someone. SOMEONE keeps his gaze locked on his boss as he uses a pair of pliers to tug a crossbow bolt out of the tree. SOMEONE nods, seemingly to no one.
Her lips part as she nods.
As he nods off, the camera falls.

inside, he lightly taps on a door and enters a boxing club. He nods to a man in a suit and walks into the smoky lounge. SOMEONE passes businessmen at tables and makes his way to the front of the room by a bar.
Staring fearfully, the children nod. SOMEONE yanks off her apron and marches out.
He nods then looks forward.
She nods, smiling broadly. SOMEONE crosses to her and she meets him halfway. She grips his shoulders and looks into his eyes.
She nods.
He nods and glances around.
She nods, beaming.
he nods.
He nods, then waggles a finger at a scarlet A on her pink bustier.
She nods emphatically. SOMEONE lays a hand on her shoulder.
Hurls his cell out of the door then nods at the executive.
Lifting his brow he nods earnestly.
SOMEONE levels a scolding finger at SOMEONE and glances between the lovers, then nods. SOMEONE shakes his head.
He pictures the skeleton nodding at him.

Sitting beside the general, SOMEONE lowers his gaze. The official glances to a comrade then nods. Now SOMEONE stands, prompting the others. He nods to the official's opponent who leaves. A man with a briefcase shakes the general's hand. Outside, the departing Baptists get into a sedan and drive off.
She hands him her contact info and he nods.
She nods.
She nods and they share a smile.
He nods and follows her to the passenger door.
He nods, his eyes saddened.
She nods and the man reaches his hand toward her dog.
He smiles at the flower then nods to SOMEONE. He touches the brim of his cap.
SOMEONE glances at SOMEONE then nods.
He nods to the audience then bows to SOMEONE.
He nods, suppressing a grin.
She nods. Meanwhile, the cruiser speeds down a nearby road.
SOMEONE wipes his brow, then nods.
She nods at SOMEONE.
they nod then drive off.
She nods and leans toward him. They share a steady kiss.
As she places it in her shallow vegetable basket SOMEONE strolls into the garden. She nods irritably to herself.
SOMEONE leans heavily against an arched doorway. As SOMEONE's chest heaves she nods and lowers her tearful gaze. SOMEONE swallows, scratches the back of his head, then hurries out.
He nods at her beaming. SOMEONE smiles and looks away.
She nods.
SOMEONE stares wide-eyed at her. He shifts his gaze then nods.
She nods again, her face solemn.
She nods.
Gazing into his eyes, SOMEONE softly nods.
She nods.
He nods and reaches for the door.
She nods to herself then cracks up.
SOMEONE lowers her gaze. She nods miserably.
She nods.
She nods off, but awakens as her head drops.
She nods off again.
She smiles at him warmly. He nods pensively and gazes ahead.
He nods to SOMEONE who turns on a fan.
She nods skeptically.
Without turning, he nods.
They nod. SOMEONE smiles sadly.
Cyril's lips purse into an uncertain smirk. His father flashes a hint of a smile, then nods.
He holds his mother's gaze. She nods tearfully.
she nods.
He nods.
SOMEONE slowly nods.
He nods toward an unshaven man.
To our family, sister. The man beside him nods to her.
A tiny smile touches SOMEONE's lips and he nods. As he turns from the window, he spots a news report on the monitor. A caption underneath footage of Matveyev reads, Russian President alive.
She nods.
SOMEONE's lips spread into a smile and he nods.
She nods.
SOMEONE holds SOMEONE's gaze. The young man shifts his eyes, then nods.
Two spectators stare curiously at SOMEONE and he nods at SOMEONE.
SOMEONE<Sparkle> gives a little nod.
He nods his head several times.
She nods and heads down a hall.
Lowering the glass, he nods.
Staring at her intently, he nods.
She nods to her friend and they both face their terminals.
Resting her chin in her hand and keeping her eyes on the city, she nods.
She nods.
She nods emphatically.
She nods plainly. SOMEONE<Matt> wears a nonplussed smile, then walks his daughter to their car.
and he nods sadly.
SOMEONE vigorously nods his head.
He nods.
After a moment, a small smile forms on SOMEONE's lips, and she nods slightly to herself.
She turns to him tearfully and he nods. He gives her a kind look.
SOMEONE nod.
She nods and he grins brightly.
She nods then lifts her eyes to the falling snow.
They nod to her and leave.
SOMEONE gives a shock gape then nods and smiles politely.
SOMEONE blinks at SOMEONE then nods.
The men nod to one another then drink.
SOMEONE drops his gaze and works his lips. He nods. They share a chuckle.
Smiling tearfully, she nods.
She nods at her hand which he grasps.
She nods. SOMEONE<Mike> sits a few rows up.
She nods and raises the hot dog.
Her father looks to Spar, then nods resolutely.
He lifts his excited gaze to SOMEONE. Struggling to remain composed, she nods.
She nods. He gazes at her.
She gives a man standing guard a little nod, then heads further in.
Taking off his socks, he nods.
She nods.
He nods.
He nods.
He nods.
SOMEONE points to SOMEONE's crotch. Furrowing his brow, he nods.
They nod.
He nods. Gradually, in tiny starts and stops, their faces come closer and closer together.
Under SOMEONE's firm gaze, Shane swallows hard then nods. He returns a can of pepper spray to its holder on a.
